class.name: CATDftCGMContainerAccess
class.abstract: Class to retrieve the CGM container of a Drawing or a 2D Layout.

method.name: GetCGMContainer
method.abstract: Returns the CGM container of a Drawing or a 2D Layout.

class.name: CATDftDrawingPLMServices
class.abstract: This toolbox purposes services to create a Drawing representation reference and to navigate between the representation reference and the Drawing root.

method.name: CreateDrawingRepReference
method.abstract: Creates a complete Drawing representation reference.

method.name: GetAvailableDrawingStandards
method.abstract: Gets list of available drawing standards.

method.name: GetDrawingRepresentation
method.abstract: Gets the Drawing representation from Drawing root.

method.name: GetDrawingRoot
method.abstract: Gets the Drawing root from Drawing representation.

method.name: GetListOfSheetStyles
method.abstract: Gets list of available sheet styles for a defined standard.

class.name: CATDftGenPLMServices
class.abstract: This toolbox purposes services to manage the 3D Data referenced from a given Drawing Representation Reference.

method.name: Load3DDataFromDrawing
method.abstract: Loads the 3D Data pointed by the Drawing representation Reference.

class.name: CATDftGenViewServices
class.abstract: This toolbox purposes services to manage a generative view.

method.name: IsPlanarFacePerpendicularToGenView
method.abstract: Checks whether a face is perpendicular to a generative view.

enum.name: CATDftGenViewsPosMode
enum.abstract: Positioning mode values for generative views inside the sheet.

enum.name: CATDftRepresentationMode
enum.abstract: Representation mode of a generative view.

enum.name: CatDrwNewSheetFrom
enum.abstract: Enum for the way of new sheet creation.

class.name: CATIDRWBGFRAMEConfiguration
class.abstract: Interface to create a new workbench of the Drawing representation.

class.name: CATIDRWFRAMEAddin
class.abstract: Interface to add toolbars in the Drafting workbench.

class.name: CATIDRWFRAMEConfiguration
class.abstract: Interface to create a new workbench of the Drawing representation.

class.name: CATIDft2DPrintArea
class.abstract: Interface used to manage a print area.

method.name: GetActivationState
method.abstract: Returns the activation state of the print area.

method.name: GetArea
method.abstract: Gets the printing area defined on an object.

class.name: CATIDftAreaFill
class.abstract: Interface to manage the Areafill object.

method.name: GetPattern
method.abstract: Gets the pattern used for area fill representation.

method.name: SetPattern
method.abstract: Sets the pattern used for area fill representation.

class.name: CATIDftAxisLine
class.abstract: Interface to manage an axis lines.

method.name: GetOverruns
method.abstract: Get over run values.

method.name: SetOverruns
method.abstract: Set over run values.

class.name: CATIDftBaseDressUpFactory
class.abstract: Interface factory to create area fills and pictures.

method.name: CreateAreaFill
method.abstract: Creates an isolated area fill.

method.name: CreateAreaFill
method.abstract: Creates an area fill associated to geometry.

method.name: CreatePicture
method.abstract: Creates a picture.

method.name: CreatePicture
method.abstract: Creates a picture.

class.name: CATIDftCenterLine
class.abstract: Interface to manage a center lines or thread.

method.name: GetOverRuns
method.abstract: Get over run values.

method.name: SetOverRuns
method.abstract: Set over run values.

class.name: CATIDftColoringPattern
class.abstract: Manage a Coloring pattern.

method.name: GetColor
method.abstract: Gets the RGB color number of the Coloring element.

method.name: SetColor
method.abstract: Set the RGB color number of the Coloring element.

class.name: CATIDftDitto
class.abstract: Interface of 2D Ditto.

method.name: Get2DAxisMatrix
method.abstract: Gets the position matrix of the ditto.

method.name: GetDetail
method.abstract: Gets the associated detail.

method.name: GetDittoFlip
method.abstract: Gets the flip state of the ditto.

method.name: GetDittoPosition
method.abstract: Gets the ditto position.

method.name: GetDittoRotation
method.abstract: Gets the angle of the ditto.

method.name: GetDittoScale
method.abstract: Gets the ditto scale.

method.name: GetListOfModifiableObjects
method.abstract: Gets the list of objects modifiable in the ditto.

method.name: SetDittoFlip
method.abstract: Manages the flip of the ditto.

method.name: SetDittoPosition
method.abstract: Sets the ditto position.

method.name: SetDittoRotation
method.abstract: Sets the angle of the ditto.

method.name: SetDittoScale
method.abstract: Sets the ditto scale.

class.name: CATIDftDottingPattern
class.abstract: Manage a Dotting pattern.

method.name: GetBrightness
method.abstract: Get the brightness of the dots of a defined Dotting element.

method.name: GetColor
method.abstract: Get the color number of a defined Dotting element.

method.name: GetPitch
method.abstract: Get the distance between 2 consecutive lines of a defined Dotting element.

method.name: GetZigZag
method.abstract: Get the zigzag of the dots of a defined Dotting element.

method.name: SetBrightness
method.abstract: Set the brightness of the dots of the Dotting element.

method.name: SetColor
method.abstract: Set the color number of the lines of the Dotting element.

method.name: SetPitch
method.abstract: Set the distance between 2 consecutive lines of the Dotting element.

method.name: SetZigZag
method.abstract: Set the zigzag of the dots of the Dotting element.

class.name: CATIDftDrawing
class.abstract: Interface of the drawing object.

method.name: AddSheet
method.abstract: This method is used to create a sheet in the drawing.

method.name: GetActiveSheet
method.abstract: Gets the active sheet in the drawing.

method.name: GetActiveView
method.abstract: Gets the active view in the drawing.

method.name: GetDrawingFactory
method.abstract: Description : returns the Drawing factory.

method.name: GetSheets
method.abstract: Returns the sheets referenced by the drawing.

method.name: GetStandardManager
method.abstract: Description : returns the standard manager.

method.name: GetViews
method.abstract: Description : returns the views referenced by the drawing.

method.name: RemoveSheet
method.abstract: this method is used to remove a sheet in the drawing.

method.name: ReorderSheets
method.abstract: Change the positions of the sheets in a drawing according to the given ordered list.

method.name: SetActiveSheet
method.abstract: Sets the active sheet in the drawing.

method.name: ValidateSheetOrder
method.abstract: Validates that the given ordered list can be used as an input for ReorderSheet.

class.name: CATIDftElementInView
class.abstract: Interface used to get the view containing an element.

method.name: GetView
method.abstract: Gets the view containing the element.

class.name: CATIDftFactory
class.abstract: Interface implemented by the drafting container used to create basic drawing features.

method.name: CreateColoringPattern
method.abstract: To create a subobject of pattern with a specific color.

method.name: CreateDottingPattern
method.abstract: To create a subobject of pattern with many points.

method.name: CreateDrwAxisSysteme
method.abstract: To create an DrwAxisSysteme objects.

method.name: CreateHatchingPattern
method.abstract: To create a subobject from pattern with many lines.

method.name: CreateMotifPattern
method.abstract: To create a subobject of pattern with a specific motif.

method.name: CreatePattern
method.abstract: To create a generic pattern object.

class.name: CATIDftFramingDefinition
class.abstract: Interface used to manage framing of the views.

method.name: GetFramePoints
method.abstract: Access to the frame points definition.

method.name: GetFramingInformations
method.abstract: Get the informations related to the frame : availability and number of definition points.

method.name: SetFramePoints
method.abstract: Set the points of the polygone 's frame definition.

method.name: SetFramingAvailability
method.abstract: Set the availability of the frame.

method.name: SetFramingProfileStatus
method.abstract: Set the visibility of the framing profile.

class.name: CATIDftGen3DSpaceClipping3DGeometry
class.abstract: Interface for 3D Space Clipping purpose.
class.seeList:
CATDftGen3DSpaceClipping3DGeometryAdapt

BOA information: this interface CAN be implemented using the BOA (Basic Object Adapter).

,

method.name: GetClippingBody
method.abstract: Returns 3D clipping geometry.

class.name: CATIDftGenerSpec
class.abstract: Interface to specialize a generative drawing view.

method.name: CreateAlone3DSpaceClipping
method.abstract: Creates a 3D Space clipping object (clipping not defined by a 3D object).

method.name: Get3DSpaceClipping
method.abstract: Gets the 3D object defining the 3D space clipping.

method.name: Get3DSpaceClippingType
method.abstract: Gets the 3D space clipping object type.

method.name: GetAxisSystem
method.abstract: GetAxisSystem.

method.name: GetBox3D
method.abstract: Retrieves box mathematical definition.

method.name: GetBox3DOptions
method.abstract: Gets parameters on a box operator.

method.name: GetBreakViewInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the BreakView definition in the drawing view.

method.name: GetDetailProfile
method.abstract: Returns geometric informations about profile for detail view.

method.name: GetExtendedObject
method.abstract: Get the extended object.

method.name: GetGVSName
method.abstract: GetGVSName.

method.name: GetGenViewLinks
method.abstract: Ges links of the view.

method.name: GetGenViewLinks
method.abstract: Ges links of the view.

method.name: GetGenViewProperties
method.abstract: Gets View Properties.

method.name: GetNbBreakouts
method.abstract: Gets the number of breakouts contained in the view.

method.name: GetNbBreaks
method.abstract: Gets the number of breaks contained in the view.

method.name: GetOriginCallout
method.abstract: Gets the callout defining the view.

method.name: GetPosition
method.abstract: Gets the position.

method.name: GetProjectionPlane
method.abstract: Gets the projection plane.

method.name: GetProjectionProfile
method.abstract: Returns geometric informations about profile for auxiliary view.

method.name: GetSectionProfile
method.abstract: Retrieves the section definition in the drawing view.

method.name: IsClipped
method.abstract: Checks if the view is a clipping view.

method.name: IsClippedByBox
method.abstract: Checks if the view contains a clipping box operator.

method.name: Remove3DSpaceClipping
method.abstract: Removes the 3D space clipping from the view.

method.name: RemoveGVS
method.abstract: RemoveGVS.

method.name: Set3DSpaceClipping
method.abstract: Creates or modifies a 3D Space clipping object (modify is 3D space clipping already existing).

method.name: SetAxisSystem
method.abstract: SetAxisSystem.

method.name: SetGVSName
method.abstract: SetGVSName.

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Sets the position.

class.name: CATIDftHatchingPattern
class.abstract: Manage a hatching pattern.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Get the angle of lines based on axis x (degre), for a defined hatching element.

method.name: GetColor
method.abstract: Get the color number of a defined hatching element.

method.name: GetNbHatching
method.abstract: Get the number of hatching elements.

method.name: GetOffset
method.abstract: Get the offset between the sheet origin and the first hatching line of the defined hatching element.

method.name: GetPitch
method.abstract: Get the distance between 2 consecutive lines of a defined hatching element.

method.name: GetTexture
method.abstract: Get the texture number of a defined hatching element.

method.name: GetThikness
method.abstract: Get the thickness number of a defined hatching element.

method.name: SetAngle
method.abstract: Set the angle of hatching lines based on axis x (degre).

method.name: SetColor
method.abstract: Set the color number of the lines of the hatching element.

method.name: SetHatching
method.abstract: Set a new Hatching element to the current one.

method.name: SetOffset
method.abstract: Set the offset between the sheet origin and the first hatching line.

method.name: SetPitch
method.abstract: Set the distance between 2 consecutive lines of the hatching element.

method.name: SetTexture
method.abstract: Set the texture number of the lines of the hatching element.

method.name: SetThikness
method.abstract: Set the thickness of the lines of the hatching element.

class.name: CATIDftMotifPattern
class.abstract: Manage a Motif pattern.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Get the angle of the used motif based on axis x (degre).

method.name: GetMotif
method.abstract: Get the Motif of a defined element.

method.name: GetOffset
method.abstract: Get the offset of the used motif.

method.name: GetPixelImage
method.abstract: Get the image of the used motif.

method.name: GetScale
method.abstract: Get the scale of the used motif.

method.name: SetAngle
method.abstract: Set the angle of the used motif.

method.name: SetMotif
method.abstract: Set the motif of the element.

method.name: SetOffset
method.abstract: Set the offset of the used motif.

method.name: SetPixelImage
method.abstract: Set the image of the used motif.

method.name: SetScale
method.abstract: Set the scale of the used motif.

class.name: CATIDftMultiSheetMode
class.abstract: Interface used to manage multisheet command.

method.name: GetMultiSheetMode
method.abstract: Get the mode multi-sheet.

method.name: SetMultiSheetMode
method.abstract: Set the mode to multi-sheet.

class.name: CATIDftPattern
class.abstract: Manage a generic pattern object.

method.name: GetPatternType
method.abstract: Get the type of the pattern.

class.name: CATIDftSheet
class.abstract: Interface of the Sheet object.

method.name: CreateDetailView
method.abstract: Create a detail view in the detail sheet .

method.name: CreateView
method.abstract: Create a view in the Sheet.

method.name: GetBackgroundView
method.abstract: Gets the background view in the sheet.

method.name: GetDefaultActiveView
method.abstract: Gets the view which have to be activated in the sheet.

method.name: GetDrawing
method.abstract: Gets the drawing containing this sheet.

method.name: GetGenViewsPosMode
method.abstract: Gets the stability mode for the position of generative views inside the sheet.

method.name: GetMainView
method.abstract: Gets the main view in the sheet.

method.name: GetProjectionMethod
method.abstract: Gets the projection method in this sheet.

method.name: GetScale
method.abstract: Gets the global scale associated to the sheet.

method.name: GetViews
method.abstract: Returns the view referenced by the sheet.

method.name: IsCurrent
method.abstract: This method is used to know if the sheet is the current one in the drawing.

method.name: IsDetail
method.abstract: Used to know if a sheet can be used to as a detail sheet.

method.name: ReorderViews
method.abstract: Change the positions of the views in a sheet according to the given ordered list.

method.name: SetDefaultActiveView
method.abstract: ets the view which have to be activated in the sheet.

method.name: SetGenViewsPosMode
method.abstract: Changes the stability mode for the position of generative views inside the sheet.

method.name: SetPrintArea
method.abstract: Sets a set of coordinates to define a rectangle print area.

method.name: SetPrintAreaActivationState
method.abstract: Activates or deactivates the print area.

method.name: SetProjectionMethod
method.abstract: Sets the projection method in this sheet.

method.name: SetScale
method.abstract: Sets the global scale associated to the sheet.

method.name: ValidateViewOrder
method.abstract: Validates that the given ordered list can be used as an input for ReorderViews.

class.name: CATIDftSpecialDressUpFactory
class.abstract: Interface factory to create axis lines, center lines and threads.

method.name: CreateAxisLine
method.abstract: Creates an Axis Line.

method.name: CreateCenterLine
method.abstract: Creates a Center Line.

method.name: CreateThread
method.abstract: Creates a Thread.

class.name: CATIDftThread
class.abstract: Interface to manage thread type and representation.

method.name: GetThreadInfo
method.abstract: Get Thread information.

method.name: SetThreadType
method.abstract: Set the thread quadrant and the thread type.

class.name: CATIDftView
class.abstract: Interface of the drawing view object.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Used to Activate the view.

method.name: AddApplicativeExtension
method.abstract: Adds an extension to the view to deal with a specific applicative behavior.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Gets the view orientation in the sheet.

method.name: GetApplicativeExtension
method.abstract: Returns the extension of the view which deals with a specific applicative behavior.

method.name: GetAxisData
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the view coordinate system origin.

method.name: GetComponents
method.abstract: Used to get the view components (annotations, geometry, callout, .

method.name: GetOleSiteList
method.abstract: Gets the list of OLE sites of the views.

method.name: GetScale
method.abstract: Gets the view scale.

method.name: GetScaleFactor
method.abstract: Enables the user to get the global scale factor between the scale of the view and the global scaling applied by the sheet to the views.

method.name: GetSheet
method.abstract: Gets the sheet containing the view representation.

method.name: GetViewLink
method.abstract: Gets the information concerning the view position rule.

method.name: GetViewName
method.abstract: Gets the view name as a string.

method.name: GetViewNameFormula
method.abstract: Gets the view name formula.

method.name: GetViewType
method.abstract: Gets the view type.

method.name: IsActive
method.abstract: Used to know if this view is active.

method.name: IsAxisVisible
method.abstract: Used to know if the view axis is visible.

method.name: IsFrameVisible
method.abstract: Used to know if the dynamic frame showing the view bounding box is visible.

method.name: LinkWith
method.abstract: Used to link the view in position with an other one.

method.name: SetAngle
method.abstract: Sets the view orientation in the sheet.

method.name: SetAxisData
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of the view coordinate system origin.

method.name: SetAxisVisibility
method.abstract: Description : Sets the view axis visibility.

method.name: SetFrameVisibility
method.abstract: Description : Sets the view frame visibility.

method.name: SetScale
method.abstract: Sets the view scale.

method.name: SetViewName
method.abstract: Sets the view name as a string.

method.name: SetViewType
method.abstract: Sets the view type.

class.name: CATIDrwCalloutAccess
class.abstract:
Interface to manage callout

Callout represents an operation that has been performed on a generative view (such as a section cut for example).

method.name: GetArrowsAttachment
method.abstract: Returns attachment of callout arrows.

method.name: GetArrowsPosition
method.abstract: Returns the Position of Callout Arrows.

method.name: GetArrowsThickness
method.abstract: Returns the thickness of Callout Arrows.

method.name: GetAssociatedView
method.abstract: Returns the associated view to callout.

method.name: GetCalloutText
method.abstract: Returns text.

method.name: GetCalloutType
method.abstract: Returns the type of callout.

method.name: GetCornerLength
method.abstract: Returns the length of corner.

method.name: GetCornerLineType
method.abstract: Returns the line type of corner.

method.name: GetCornerThickness
method.abstract: Returns the thickness of corner.

method.name: GetInfoOfArrow
method.abstract: Returns informations of one arrow.

method.name: GetNumberOfArrow
method.abstract: Returns the number of arrows.

method.name: GetNumberOfTexts
method.abstract: Returns the number of texts.

method.name: GetProfileLineType
method.abstract: Returns the line type of profile.

method.name: GetProfileThickness
method.abstract: Returns the thickness of profile.

method.name: GetVisibility
method.abstract: Returns the visibility of the profile.

method.name: SetArrowsAttachment
method.abstract: Sets attachment of callout arrows.

method.name: SetArrowsPosition
method.abstract: Sets the Position of Callout Arrows.

method.name: SetArrowsThickness
method.abstract: Sets the thickness of Callout Arrows.

method.name: SetCornerLength
method.abstract: Sets the length of corner.

method.name: SetCornerLineType
method.abstract: Sets the line type of corner.

method.name: SetCornerThickness
method.abstract: Sets the thickness of corner.

method.name: SetInfoOfArrow
method.abstract: Sets informations of one arrow.

method.name: SetProfileLineType
method.abstract: Sets the line type of profile.

method.name: SetProfileThickness
method.abstract: Sets the thickness of profile.

method.name: SetVisibility
method.abstract: Sets the visibility of the profile.

class.name: CATIDrwConstructionLines
class.abstract: Interface implemented by views.

method.name: AddAuxElem
method.abstract: Builds construction lines between a view and a single element.

method.name: AddAuxView
method.abstract: Builds all construction lines between a view and an other one.

method.name: GetListOfAuxiliaryViews
method.abstract: Retrieves the auxiliary views which provide the construction lines.

method.name: GetListOfElems
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of elements belonging to a view which provide the construction lines.

method.name: GetMyView
method.abstract: Retrieves the main view.

method.name: RemoveAuxElem
method.abstract: Removes construction lines coming from a single element.

method.name: RemoveAuxView
method.abstract: Removes all construction lines between a view and an other.

class.name: CATIDrwDetailWkbAddin
class.abstract: Interface of Drafting workbench.

class.name: CATIDrwDetailWksAddin
class.abstract: Interface of Drafting workshop.

class.name: CATIDrwDetailWksConfiguration
class.abstract: Interface to add toolbars in the Drafting workbench.

class.name: CATIDrwPicture
class.abstract: Interface to handle a native Drafting Picture object.

method.name: GetCropSize
method.abstract: Gets the crop sizes of the picture in millimeters.

method.name: GetFormat
method.abstract: Gets the picture format and gives the picture size on disk as well as its compression ratio.

method.name: GetImage
method.abstract: Returns the image on which the picture is based.

method.name: GetOriginalSize
method.abstract: Gets the original size of the picture in millimeters, i.

method.name: GetPosition
method.abstract: Gets the position of the picture in its view.

method.name: GetRatioLock
method.abstract: Gets ratio ( original width / original height )lock state.

method.name: GetSize
method.abstract: Gets the current size of the picture in millimeters.

method.name: SetCropSize
method.abstract: Sets the crop sizes of the picture in millimeters.

method.name: SetFormat
method.abstract: Sets the picture format and gives the picture size on disk as well as its compression ratio.

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Sets the position of the picture in its view.

method.name: SetRatioLock
method.abstract: Sets ratio ( original width / original height )lock state.

method.name: SetSize
method.abstract: Sets the current size of the picture in millimeters.
